text: May 12, 2018 / 2:17 PM / Updated 28 minutes ago IPL Scoreboard Reuters Staff 3 Min Read May 12 (OPTA) - Scoreboard at close of play on the first day of match 44 between Kings XI Punjab and Kolkata Knight Riders on Saturday at Indore, India Kolkata Knight Riders win by 31 runs Kolkata Knight Riders 1st innings Chris Lynn b Andrew Tye 27 Sunil Narine c Lokesh Rahul b Andrew Tye 75 Robin Uthappa c Mohit Sharma b Andrew Tye 24 Andre Russell c Lokesh Rahul b Andrew Tye 31 Dinesh Karthik c (Sub) b Barinder Sran 50 Nitish Rana c (Sub) b Mohit Sharma 11 Shubman Gill Not Out 16 Javon Searles Not Out 6 Extras 0b 0lb 0nb 0pen 5w 5 Total (20.0 overs) 245-6 Fall of Wickets : 1-53 Lynn, 2-128 Narine, 3-129 Uthappa, 4-205 Russell, 5-218 Rana, 6-230 Karthik Did Not Bat : Chawla, Krishna, Yadav Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Mohit Sharma 4 0 40 1 10.00 1w Mujeeb Ur Rahman 2.2 0 28 0 12.00 Ravichandran Ashwin 2.4 0 36 0 13.50 1w Barinder Sran 3 0 48 1 16.00 Andrew Tye 4 0 41 4 10.25 2w Axar Patel 4 0 52 0 13.00 1w Kings XI Punjab 1st innings Lokesh Rahul b Sunil Narine 66 Chris Gayle c Dinesh Karthik b Andre Russell 21 Mayank Agarwal c Javon Searles b Andre Russell 0 Karun Nair c Prasidh Krishna b Andre Russell 3 Aaron Finch c Kuldeep Yadav b Javon Searles 34 Axar Patel c Javon Searles b Kuldeep Yadav 19 Ravichandran Ashwin lbw Prasidh Krishna 45 Andrew Tye c Dinesh Karthik b Prasidh Krishna 14 Barinder Sran Not Out 1 Mohit Sharma Not Out 4 Extras 0b 1lb 0nb 0pen 6w 7 Total (20.0 overs) 214-8 Fall of Wickets : 1-57 Gayle, 2-57 Agarwal, 3-79 Nair, 4-93 Rahul, 5-119 Patel, 6-156 Finch, 7-209 Tye, 8-210 Ashwin Did Not Bat : Ur Rahman Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Sunil Narine 4 0 44 1 11.00 Prasidh Krishna 4 0 31 2 7.75 2w Javon Searles 4 0 52 1 13.00 3w Andre Russell 4 0 41 3 10.25 Kuldeep Yadav 2 0 29 1 14.50 1w Piyush Chawla 2 0 16 0 8.00 Umpire Virender Sharma Umpire C Nandan Video Bruce Oxenford Match Referee Andrew Pycroft
